text: Wolfgang Fahrian (31 May 1941 - 13 April 2022) was a German football player. He played for West Germany national team. Fahrian died on 13 April 2022 from pneumonia in Cologne, Germany at aged 80.Torhüter und Spielerberater Wolfgang Fahrian gestorben ==Club career statistics== National Football Teams, Fahrian, Wolfgang |- |1960–61||rowspan="4"|Ulm||Oberliga||24||0 |- |1961–62||||0||0 |- |1962–63||Oberliga||30||0 |- |1963–64||Regionalliga||32||0 |- |1964–65||rowspan="2"|Hertha Berlin||Bundesliga||25||0 |- |1965–66||Regionalliga||17||1 |- |1966–67||1860 München||Bundesliga||8||0 |- |1967–68||rowspan="2"|Fortuna Düsseldorf||rowspan="2"|Regionalliga||33||0 |- |1968–69||31||0 |- |1969–70||rowspan="7"|Fortuna Köln||rowspan="4"|Regionalliga||34||1 |- |1970–71||34||0 |- |1971–72||34||0 |- |1972–73||30||0 |- |1973–74||Bundesliga||34||0 |- |1974–75||rowspan="2"|2.
